comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

From the Google results i try to translate directly the URL link. 
The language was from german to french or english


Actual results:


It gaves me 9 times the Google translate bar, but the text is not translate.
It works ok with IE.
 i'm using windows 7 32Bits, last version of Firefox




Expected results:

A translate web page , in the language i've choose, should be displayed
